text: I'm glad the parents were found safely, huh...!

Thank goodness the studio visit
didn't turn into a sad memory.

Hey, Sakuya...?
I think it's probably because of that... mask or something!

Sakuya isn't scary,
it's probably just because of the way you look right now!

No! I don't mean the costume is scary!
I think it's fantastic, but for little kids...

"Being scared" is also a kind of feedback,
we have to accept it.
